Subject: Epyon vs DarkFate
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Epyon::

"Sure," he says to Angel Prime. 
He turns to face DarkFate, barely avoiding the shots. he pulls his
energy saber, and slashes at DarkFate, at more than 100MPH.

::DrillBit::

He jumped the first missile only to be hit by the second.
"You refuse to fight like a real Transformer. With honor and dignaty.
You are pathetic, Maximal."
He simply walks away.
